title: Obagi System Professional-C  10% Vitamin C Serum, 1-Ounce Bottle (30ml)
description: Obagi Professional-C Serum provides antioxidant protection with deep penetration to the dermal layer.  The 10% L-ascorbic acid helps in defending against damaging UVA and UVB rays, helps prevent premature signs of aging such as fine lines and wrinkles, and contributes to collagen synthesis.  Obagi Professional-C Serum 10% is suitable for dry, sensitive or reactive skin.

title: Dermalogica MAP-15 Regenerator .3 oz.
description: This revolutionary powder-to-emulsion technology delivers the highest concentration of magnesium ascorbyl phosphate (map) directly into the skin to help dramatically improve skin firmness and clarity. Highly-effective form of vitamin C works with a blend of white tea, hyaluronic acid, glucosamine, phospholipids, algae and yeast extracts to help stimulate collagen production, brighten skin tone and neutralize free radicals and inhibits mmps to dramatically increase hydration, firmness and elasticity while helping to prevent the signs of aging. White tea protects against the formation of advanced glycation end-products, (ages - a damaged by-product of sugar/protein reactions in the skin). Silky emulsion glides gently over skin for efficient application, especially around the delicate eye and mouth area.

title: Keys Solar Rx Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunblock 3.4oz lotion by Keys Care
description: As a daily protection, Solar Rx is designed to offer the maximum physical protection from UVA and SPF 30 for UVB burning rays without using a chemical sunscreen. Keys Solar Rx carries a UVB (UV Burning) rating of SPF 30+ and a UVA (UV Aging) of four stars using the EU rating system. It is important to note that 90% of all visible skin aging comes from UVA.Solar Rx is both moisturizer and sunblock. It combines the healing soothing properties of Keys` Luminos moisturizer and adds a 20% concentration of uncoated nano-zinc oxide to provide a physical UVA and UVB blocking to protect against UV triggered Melanoma and Skin Cancer. Their nano-zinc oxide (ZnO) is uncoated to provide healing therapies associated with zinc oxide. The uncoated zinc has also proven to be anti-bacterial and antimicrobial and can reduce redness, rosacea, age spots and melasma. Solar Rx carries a EWG Skin Deep Rating of 0 (0 to 10 scale where 0 is best).

title: Neova Complex Cu3 Post Laser Lotion-4 oz
description: Lightweight Skin HealerNeova Complex Cu3 Post Laser Lotion is an effective healing lotion applied after microdermabrasion, laser resurfacing and laser hair removal. The product is light and gentle to apply on tender skin.Gentle on tender skinLightweightCopper helps heal woundsCopper is known to heal wounds and Peptides help restore skin. The GHK Copper Peptide Complex looks after your skin while healing. This is a lightweight product that you can cover-up easily with makeup.Just For You:All skin typesA Closer Look:Neova Complex Cu3 Post Laser Lotion is formulated with GHK Copper Peptide Complex to help heal. The complex is gentle to apply on delicate tissues. The product has copper that is proven to help heal wounds.Get Started:Apply post-procedure to skin. After laser hair removal: Apply twice daily to treated areas. Use for 3-5 days or until healing is complete. After non-invasive microdermabrasion: Apply a thin layer and massage into skin surface. Reapply twice daily for 3-5 days.

title: e.l.f. Studio SPF 45 Sunscreen UVA/UVB Protection Loose Powder (83332)
description: A portable loose powder sunscreen that can be worn alone or over any makeup for key sun protection. Shields against harmful UVA/UVB rays to prevent premature skin aging and sun damage. The soft translucent powder is infused with healthy ingredients such as Aloe Vera Extract, Grape Seed Extract and Vitamins A,C & E to help nourish and soothe the skin.
